physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Obesity, scattered rales at both bases. Regular cardiac rhythm with no murmurs.
Severe angioedema, markedly edematous tongue, generalized erythematous hue, and acute stridor. Auscultation revealed diffuse rhonchi.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Developed from baseline normal findings to severe angioedema and stridor, necessitating cricothyrotomy.
